name: pdf-to-image
description: Convert PDF to image - only JPEG supported at this time

quality.description: A value from 0 (worst) to 100 (best) indicating the JPEG quality.

description: Optionally specify the pages to render - all pages are rendered by default.

size.description: The width/height of the resulting images in pixels. By default, the pages are rendered at a DPI of 300. Specifying just one of `width/height` will maintain the aspect ratio of the page.
